name: SheaMoisture Daily Hydration Body Lotion with 100% Virgin Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Coconut Milk and Pro-Ceramides, Quickly Nourish & Soften Skin, 24H Moisturizing 16 oz
short_description: Our newly formulated SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration body lotion with Fair Trade Shea Butter + Pro-ceramides helps replenish skin and lock in moisture.
We’ve elevated the luxurious feel of our daily moisturizer blend by adding Pro-Ceramides to help restore the moisture barrier and give you healthier-looking skin.
Our skin care products, formulated with Fair-Trade Shea Butter, deliver 24H moisturization and have been tested by dermatologists to deliver for the needs of melanin-rich skin.
Infused with the best parts of the coconut, this non-greasy formula quickly absorbs into the skin and contains zero parabens, phthalates, petrolatum, or mineral oil.
Make our upgraded body lotion part of your skin care routine. For max results, smooth lotion generously all over your body, after showering or before bed to seal all that moisture.
product_description: We’ve reinvented our SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration body lotion to bring you everything you’re looking for in skincare: a creamy, fast-absorbing consistency with no sticky or white residue, incredible moisturization for dry skin, and a new pump for easier distribution. So, when you’re searching for the best body lotion for dry skin that’s balanced for everyday use, we’re here for you. SheaMoisture Daily Hydration is infused with the best parts of the coconut and the world’s best shea butter + Pro-Ceramides for long-lasting moisture and elevated results. This luxurious formula, blended with 100% Virgin Coconut Milk and Fair Trade Shea Butter immediately nourishes and softens dry skin. Its non-greasy formula quickly absorbs into the skin, leaving you with a silky-smooth finish and 24 hours of hydration. You’ll notice the impressive skin care benefits immediately! OUR STORY: SheaMoisture is the legacy of a pioneering mother of four and entrepreneur, who sold Shea Butter, African Black Soap, and homemade beauty preparations in Sierra Leone in 1912. We honor her vision by continuing to formulate with Shea Butter handcrafted by women in West Africa. We’re powered by purpose at SheaMoisture because with every purchase, you support our mission to reinvest in and serve Black communities (in the US and around the world).

name: eos Cashmere Whipped Oil Body Butter, Vanilla Cashmere, 72 Hour Weightless Moisture For Dry Skin, Rich Formula and Deep Hydration, Body Care, 10 oz
short_description: RESULTS: eos Vanilla Cashmere Whipped Oil Butter offers a luxuriously thick, rich buttery texture with 2x more moisturizers than body lotions, resulting in a great body care moisturizer for dry skin

VANILLA CASHMERE: Our sweet and nuzzly vanilla body butter captures the warmth of whipped vanilla, the softness of musk, and the coziness of caramel for a rich, luxurious fragrance with a sensual twist

CASHMERE SMOOTH COMPLEX: eos Body Butter with naturally moisturizing & protective butters for cashmere smooth skin; cocoa butter deeply hydrates, while shea butter softens, and argan butter soothes & makes skin smooth

72-HOUR WEIGHTLESS MOISTURE: eos Cashmere Whipped Oil Butter provides vanilla body care and creates a softening, smoothing velvety finish that acts as a protective barrier to lock in moisture and strengthen the skin barrier
OUR PROMISE: Cashmere Collection with a vanilla scent is dermatologist-recommended & made for sensitive skin, paraben & phthalate-free, & cruelty-free
product_description: eos Vanilla Cashmere Whipped Oil Butter is a luxurious body moisturizer and skin care product that delivers intense hydration boost and moisture retention with its thick, buttery texture. Perfect for skin that needs a little extra, dry climates, or as a nighttime treatment, this rich formula melts into skin, creating a smooth, velvety finish that locks in moisture for 72 hours. Infused with our Cashmere Smooth Complex™ of shea, cocoa, and argan butters, plus coconut oil, it softens and strengthens the skin barrier. Experience a deeply hydrating, non-greasy butter that leaves your skin feeling soft, protected, and nourished, without heaviness or stickiness of other moisturizers.

name: Saltair Multi-Lipid Body Butter - Rich, Nourishing Hydrating Body Cream with Ceramide Complex, Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, and Sea Buckthorn. Moisturizing Dry Skin Care. 10oz Jar - Golden Hour
short_description: MULTI-LIPID HYDRATION: Powered by our ceramide, phospholipid, and phytosterol complex, this rich body butter deeply nourishes and hydrates for visibly softer, smoother, and dewy-looking skin.
SKIN-BARRIER SUPPORT: A blend of sea buckthorn, coconut oil, and shea butter helps replenish lipids and lock in moisture, supporting skin barrier health and long-lasting hydration.

GOLDEN HOUR FRAGRANCE: Radiant Sunflower, Juicy Pineapple, and Fresh Coconut is a bright and uplifting tropical blend, bursting with sunny florals, luscious fruit, and creamy, beachy warmth. Sun-drenched and enticing, Golden Hour transports you to a sun-kissed paradise.
FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: Suitable for sensitive skin, perfect for dry skin, and balancing for oily skin. This thick, rich cream has a fast-absorbing texture and leaves no greasy or sticky residue
GOOD FOR SKIN: Just like all our products, this one is also Cruelty-free, vegan, gluten- and paraben-free. Set includes one 10-oz body butter. Saltair. Body Care is Skin Care.

name: The Body Shop Coconut Body Butter, 1.69 Oz
short_description: Give your skin a dose of ultra-rich hydration when you apply this nourishing coconut body butter.
With 48hr moisturizing properties, your skin will stay softer for longer.
Body moisturizer softens skin.
For dry / very dry skin.
Fresh coconut scent.
product_description: Drench your skin in this rich intensive butter with the lush tropical scent of coconut. Our Coconut range of products are made with pure virgin organic cold-pressed coconut oil from our new community trade supplier in the Pacific islands of Samoa. This organically certified oil is acquired through natural processes, without the use of chemical extraction. This means that more of its beneficial natural nutrients are retained, so you can be sure that you're using the purest, highest quality ingredients to care for your skin. Filled with community fair trade cocoa butter and shea butter which melts at body temperature delivering intensive moisturization for up to 24-hours.

product_description: Get healthy-looking, glowing skin with Gold Bond Cocoa Butter Glow Daily Hydrating Lotion for dry skin. The triple-action formula gently exfoliates, hydrates and locks in moisture for 24 hours. You won't even know it's there while it nurtures your skin with seven nourishing moisturizers and Vitamins B, C and E. Formulated with coconut oil, cocoa butter, and shea butter, this moisturizing cream nourishes dry, ashy skin for a healthy-looking glow. Join the 88% who saw smooth and glowing skin in one day* with Gold Bond Cocoa Butter Glow Daily Hydrating Lotion. DIRECTIONS: Apply liberally to skin as often as needed. Reapply to increase level of moisturization and keep visibly dry skin from coming back. *Based on a third-party clinical study

name: Palmer's Coconut Oil Formula Body Balm, 3.5 Ounces
short_description: Coconut Oil Body Balm: This raw coconut oil balm offers multi-purpose hydration and skin repair for rough, dry, damaged and cracked skin. Its solid formula that won't melt or get messy in the heat

Natural Formula: Made with 100% Fair Trade Certified Organic Coconut Oil and Green Coffee Extract, this,multi-purpose balm nourishes and hydrates head to toe, from dry cuticles to cracked heels. No parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, gluten, sulfates, or dyes

Finest Ingedients: We strive to use only the finest natural, raw ingredients to bring you soft, hydrated & beautiful hair & skin. We support sustainable production of Shea & Cocoa Butter & Coconut Oil worldwide

Choose What's Real: Our beauty products & hair & skin treatments feature real high-quality, plant-based ingredients in formulas that really work to hydrate & soften, from lip balm to bar soap to body butter

Palmer's: Our Cocoa Butter, Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Olive Oil, and Vitamin E product lines include creams, balms, lotions, oils and soaps for hand and body, face, lip, and hair care, pregnancy and stretch mark care
product_description: Hydrate and replenish skin with Palmer's Coconut Oil Formula daily body balm, crafted with antioxidant-rich Coconut Oil and Green Coffee Extract for radiant, healthy-looking skin. This moisturizing body lotion for dry skin delivers luxurious long lasting moisture for decadently pampered skin all day long. Proudly made in U.S.A., Palmer's has been a trusted brand for over 180 years, providing high-quality natural products that are passed down from generation to generation. America's #1 Coconut Oil Skin Care brand Palmer's Coconut Oil Formula uses the highest quality natural ingredients for superior moisturization head-to-toe.
